movie.title: The Foreigner
movie.description_intro: The story of humble London businessman Quan (Chan), whose long-buried past erupts in a revenge-fueled vendetta when the only person left for him to love - his teenage daughter - is taken from him in a senseless act of politically-motivated terrorism. In his relentless search for the identity of the terrorists, Quan is forced into a cat- and-mouse conflict with a Irish government official (Brosnan), whose own past may hold clues to the identities of the elusive killers.
movie.description_full: The story of humble London businessman Quan (Chan), whose long-buried past erupts in a revenge-fueled vendetta when the only person left for him to love - his teenage daughter - is taken from him in a senseless act of politically-motivated terrorism. In his relentless search for the identity of the terrorists, Quan is forced into a cat- and-mouse conflict with a Irish government official (Brosnan), whose own past may hold clues to the identities of the elusive killers.

movies.title: Ordet
movies.summary: How do we understand faith and prayer, and what of miracles? August 1925 on a Danish farm. Widowed Patriarch Borgen, who's rather prominent in his community, has three sons: Mikkel, a good-hearted agnostic whose wife Inger is pregnant, Johannes, who believes he is Jesus, and Anders, young, slight, in love with the tailor's daughter. The fundamentalist sect of the girl's father is anathema to Borgen's traditional Lutheranism; he opposes the marriage until the tailor forbids it, then Borgen's pride demands that it happen. Unexpectedly, Inger, who is the family's sweetness and light, has problems with her pregnancy. The rational doctor arrives, and a long night brings sharp focus to at least four views of faith.

movies.title: Boss Level
movies.summary: A retired special forces officer is trapped in a never ending time loop on the day of his death.
movies.description_full: A retired special forces officer is trapped in a never ending time loop on the day of his death.
movies.synopsis: A retired special forces officer is trapped in a never ending time loop on the day of his death.

movies.title: Rogue Warfare
movies.summary: A group of the best military personnel from the U.S., Russia, UK, China and France join forces to fight an underground terrorist network.
movies.description_full: A group of the best military personnel from the U.S., Russia, UK, China and France join forces to fight an underground terrorist network.
movies.synopsis: A group of the best military personnel from the U.S., Russia, UK, China and France join forces to fight an underground terrorist network.

movies.title: XX
movies.summary: XX is a new horror anthology with a gender twist - all segments will be helmed by female directors and will star female leads. The directors have been given free creative rein within budget and time constraints, but all of the segments themselves will involve the horror genre.
movies.description_full: XX is a new horror anthology with a gender twist - all segments will be helmed by female directors and will star female leads. The directors have been given free creative rein within budget and time constraints, but all of the segments themselves will involve the horror genre.
